patthana24.17:1.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.17:1.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.17:1.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana24.17:2.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.17:2.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.17:2.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
